contentList.content: Force Wisdom <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> on nearby enemies. Affected entity can't be targeted by enemy attacks or spells if they fail the saving throw. However, it can still take damage from spells that influence a larger area. Condition ends if the affected entity attacks or harms another creature.
This entity cannot attack the Sanctuary bearer
Sanctuary holds no sway to this entity
This entity cannot attack the Sanctuary bearer
Enemies around you or target cannot target you or the target if they fail Wisdom <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> on their turn. You can still take damage from area spells.

Until the affected entity attacks or harms another creature, it cannot be targeted by enemy attacks if they fail their Wisdom <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> . However, it can still take damage from spells that influence a larger area.
